metadata.description: Picking up from the shocking events of issue #1... after months of dead ends and uncooperative authorities, Will Harden focuses his desperation to find his missing wife and turns to an unlikely source to help locate her...but is it already too late?? As he begins to unravel the truth, Harden will discover that the answers he seeks are far out of this world!  Written and created by Frank Mastromauro, featuring artwork by the talented newcomer Marco Lorenzana, OVERTAKEN is going to take your breath away and leave you gasping for more!
metadata.name: Overtaken
